name: riddle_0
description: I have one letter but my name is spelled with eight. What am I?

name: riddle_1
description: Swap one letter from each of the words

name: riddle_2
description: I can fill up an entire room and still not take up any space. Who am I?

name: riddle_3
description: I am a two digit even number. I am a square of a number, and also a cube of another number. Who am I?

name: riddle_4
description: I am 3/8 of Tortoise, 2/5 of Onion and 2/6 of Tomato. Who am I?

name: riddle_5
description: I am a drink. I am also an alphabet? Who am I?

name: riddle_6
description: I cannot speak but I tell everything. I am not a tree but I have leaves. I have hinges but I am neither a door nor a window. Who am I?

name: riddle_7
description: I don't have legs but I have hands. I can run but I can't walk. Who am I?

name: riddle_8
description: I have a thumb and four fingers, but I have no flesh or bone. Who am I?

name: riddle_9
description: I start with T and end with T and have T in me. Who am I?
